title: Summary page
heading: Check your answers
checkCarefully: Check the information below carefully. This will form a record of your application for probate. It will also be stored as a public record, and will be able to be viewed online.
executorsWhenDiedQuestion: Did {executorFullName} die before the person who died?

dodBeforeDob.summary: Date of death cannot be before date of birth

ihtNetGreaterThanGross.summary: Net IHT value cannot be greater than the Gross value
